metadata.title: CVE-2015-6938 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the file browser in notebook/notebookapp.py in IPython Notebook before 3.2.2 and Jupyter Notebook 4.0.x before 4.0.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a folder name.  NOTE: this was originally reported as a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability, but this may be inaccurate.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ipython3 - 5.5.0-1
python3-ipython - 5.5.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ipython package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.0-1').
